items.name: Object_Video
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Object_Video
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================
class Object_Video extends ui.Object_UIElement
    ###*
    * A game object used for custom texts in a scene.
    *
    * @module gs
    * @class Object_Video
    * @extends gs.Object_Visual
    * @memberof gs
    * @constructor
    ###
    constructor: (data) ->
        super
        
        ###*
        * The UI object's source rectangle on screen.
        * @property srcRect
        * @type gs.Rect
        ###
        @srcRect = null
        
        ###*
        * The UI object's visual-component to display the game object on screen.
        * @property visual
        * @type gs.Component_Sprite
        ###
        @visual = new gs.Component_Sprite()
        
        ###*
        * An event-emitter to emit events.
        * @property events
        * @type gs.Component_EventEmitter
        ###
        @events = new gs.EventEmitter()
        
        @addComponent(@events)
        @addComponent(@visual)
     
        
ui.Object_Video = Object_Video
